title: How Many Calories in Budweiser?

faqs.q: How many calories is in one Budweiser bottle?

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Budweiser?

faqs.q: Does Budweiser have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 1.3 g protein and 0 g fat per 12 oz.

faqs.q: How does Bud Light compare in calories to Budweiser?
